Title: 051: Understanding the Newest Big Data Technology Buzz Terms
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the Global Analytics Consultant Scott King. You will predominantly hear about Hadoop, get to learn about HDFS, MapReduce, Hive, Kudu, Spark, YARN & Seahorse, what is a Data Lake and how it is useful, hear advice for public speaking and get some tips and tricks on how to prepare on Data Science presentations and prepare for your audiences.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/51
